mapper.insert: insert into ad_order_flow ( id, order_report_id, serial_number, pay_type, amount, create_by, type, del_flag, remarks, update_date, update_by, create_date ) values ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderReportId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
